items.name: password-based-auth-nextjs
items.title: Password-Based Authentication (Next.js)
items.description: Complete password-based authentication flow for Next.js with Convex Auth. Includes login, sign-up, password reset, protected routes, and full Convex backend.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: password-based-auth-react
items.title: Password-Based Authentication (React)
items.description: Password-based authentication components for React with Convex Auth. Includes login, sign-up forms, and full Convex backend.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `VITE_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: password-based-auth-tanstack
items.title: Password-Based Authentication (TanStack)
items.description: Complete password-based authentication flow for TanStack Start with Convex Auth. Includes login, sign-up, password reset, protected routes, and full Convex backend.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `VITE_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: social-auth-nextjs
items.title: Social Authentication (Next.js)
items.description: Social authentication (OAuth) for Next.js with Convex Auth. Supports GitHub and Google sign-in with full Convex backend.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `VITE_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: realtime-chat-nextjs
items.title: Realtime Chat (Next.js)
items.description: A realtime chat component powered by Convex live queries. Messages sync instantly across all connected clients. Includes full Convex backend with demo mode support.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: realtime-cursor-nextjs
items.title: Realtime Cursors (Next.js)
items.description: Display realtime cursor positions of other users in a room. Perfect for collaborative applications. Includes full Convex backend with presence tracking.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: realtime-avatar-stack-nextjs
items.title: Realtime Avatar Stack (Next.js)
items.description: Display a stack of avatars showing users currently present in a room. Updates in realtime as users join and leave. Includes full Convex backend with presence tracking.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: dropzone-nextjs

items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.

items.name: current-user-avatar-nextjs
items.title: Current User Avatar (Next.js)
items.description: A reactive avatar component that displays the current authenticated user's image and name. Updates automatically when user data changes. Includes Convex backend for user queries.
items.docs: You'll need to set the following environment variable in your project: `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`. Run `npx convex dev` to get your Convex deployment URL.
